title: #26 Human Rights Watch: a tale of the refugee crisis
itunes:author: Bank Australia podcast: real stories that impact social change
itunes:summary: On this episode, Olga Klepova meets with Human Rights Watch Australia director Elaine Pearson on the eve of World Refugee Day to discuss the pressing issues of their local and global work.
